version_description:
Major update: Pets!

Now anyone can get their own cat, dog or pony to play with and look after!

* Brand new Sportsbar with live results from the football games in Brazil!

* New sports outfits and flags. Show support for your favourite football team!

Thanks for your great feedback! We are working hard on the next big update!
Thanks for all your great feedback! We are working hard to improve the Friendbase Chat, Create, Play experience. This version includes game improvements and a new way to earn Gems for Free!
Lots of new outfits and looks! See you on Friendbase!
Thanks for using Friendbase! This version includes improvements for speed and reliability. Update now!
Season Greetings! Check out the new Winterland area and outfits!
Season Greetings! Check out the new Winterland area and outfits!

In this release we are taking away the winterland rooms (winter is over), but in their stead we are re-introducing the sports bar rooms.
The version of the sports bare will give live coverage of the British Champions League tournament, as well as notifying of any upcoming events.
Want more Gems, for free? Check out the new list of offers! Watch videos, try games, take surveys. And get rewarded!

You voted for a supermarket and here it is! With new outfits and items, of course.
We also changed the chat font to accomodate more languages.

You voted for a supermarket and here it is! With new outfits and items, of course.
We also changed the chat font to accommodate more languages.
Challenge your friends in our new quiz game 'Know it? Show it!' Choose one of six categories or mix it all up!
New updated content - join your friends around the campfire.

- There is no more life limit for playing mini games!
- Bug fix on bonfire room not giving away free gems.
- Fix issues on logging in using Facebook
Changes: new game rooms and bug fixes
